name: Nokia Tower Offense
description:
This game was made for #nokiajam

Description

Have you ever played Tower Defense games? Like you gotta build towers to stop some evil army from destroying your base? Well, now you will build the towers to help the evil (or good, since they're on your side) army to destroy the base.

Controls

Arrows: Move.

Z: Build/Upgrade attacking towers.

X: Build/Upgrade healing towers.

C: Start round.

Instructions

You play up to 10 rounds. You have to build towers to heal your units (from bottom to top) or attack the enemy units (from top to bottom). Units will harm each other if they touch. Your objective is to destroy enemy's base downing its health to 0 in 10 rounds or less. If base isn't destroyed at the end of the tenth round, you lose.

10 points to build a tower.

30 points to first upgrade.

60 points to second upgrade.
